paper_metadata.title: A Counterfactual Assessment of Poverty Alleviation

component_a_cash_support.cash_evidence_citation: households who planned to be out of poverty earlier had significantly higher incomes than those later, with transfer incomes contributing substantially to the income gap

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: It was found that households who planned to be out of poverty earlier had significantly higher incomes than those later, with transfer incomes contributing substantially to the income gap
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: this study evaluated the effectiveness of the TPA strategy using a propensity scoring weighting model for multiple non-equivalent household groups based on counterfactual inference

evidence_citations.program_name_citation: China's success with the Target Poverty Alleviation (TPA) strategy has been hailed worldwide
evidence_citations.country_citation: Taking a poverty-stricken county in Southwest China as an example
evidence_citations.target_population_citation: It classified all households with per capita annual net income below the poverty line in 2013 as poverty-stricken households
